意.definition: idea; meaning; thought; to think; wish; desire; intention; to expect; to anticipate

意下如何.definition: how about it?; what do you think?

意中.definition: according with one's wish or expectation

意中事.definition: sth that is expected or wished for

意中人.definition: sweetheart; one's true love; the person of one's thoughts

意味.definition: meaning; implication; flavor; overtone; to mean; to imply; (Tw) to get a sense of

意味著.definition: to signify; to mean; to imply

意境.definition: artistic mood or conception; creative concept

意存筆先，畫盡意在.pinyin: yi4 cun2 bi3 xian1 , hua4 jin4 yi4 zai4
意存筆先，畫盡意在.definition: the idea is present before the first stroke of the brush, when the last stroke is placed the idea shines through

意思.definition: idea; opinion; meaning; wish; desire; interest; fun; token of appreciation, affection etc; CL:個|个[ge4]; to give as a small token; to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc

意思意思.definition: to do a little something as a token of one's appreciation; to express one's gratitude or esteem by treating sb to a meal or presenting a gift

意料之中.definition: to come as no surprise; as expected

意氣用事.definition: (idiom) to let emotions affect one's decisions

意淫.definition: to fantasize; (esp.) to have a sexual fantasy about (sb)

意猶未盡.definition: to wish to continue sth; to have not fully expressed oneself

意甲.definition: Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system

意符.definition: semantic component of a phono-semantic character (e.g. component 刂[dao1] in 刻[ke4])

意義.definition: sense; meaning; significance; importance; CL:個|个[ge4]

意興索然.definition: to have no interest in sth

意見.definition: idea; opinion; suggestion; objection; complaint; CL:點|点[dian3],條|条[tiao2]

意識.definition: consciousness; awareness; (usu. followed by 到[dao4]) to be aware of; to realize

意識到.definition: to be aware of; to realize

意識型態.definition: variant of 意識形態|意识形态[yi4 shi2 xing2 tai4]

意譯.definition: meaning (of foreign expression); translation of the meaning (as opposed to literal translation 直譯|直译); paraphrase; free translation

意趣.definition: interest; point of particular charm and interest

意麵.definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[yi4da4li4mian4]); (Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
